mapper.select: WITH TREE_DEPT AS (SELECT(SELECT D2.DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT D2 WHERE D1.TOP_DEPT = D2.DEPT_CODE) AS TOP, LEVEL LV, D1.DEPT_NAME AS ORIGIN, DEPT_CODE FROM DEPT D1 START WITH D1.DEPT_NAME = '출근합시다' CONNECT BY PRIOR D1.DEPT_CODE = D1.TOP_DEPT) SELECT CASE WHEN TD.LV = 1 THEN TD.ORIGIN WHEN TD.LV = 2 THEN TD.ORIGIN ELSE TOP END AS DEPT_NAME, E.EMP_NAME, J.JOB_NAME FROM TREE_DEPT TD RIGHT JOIN DEPT_HISTORY DH ON(TD.DEPT_CODE = DH.DEPT_CODE) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (E.EMPNO = DH.EMPNO) JOIN PROMOTION_HISTORY PH ON (E.EMPNO = PH.EMPNO) JOIN JOB J ON (J.JOB_CODE = PH.JOB_CODE) WHERE E.EMAIL = #{ sendMail } AND E.STATUS = 'Y'
